name: Rocket
tagline: Our mission is to Know More.
description:
Rocket is an award winning communications planning and buying agency, established in 1997. We offer the service benefits and agility of being a medium-sized, UK centric agency whilst benefiting from being part of Omnicom Media Group, UK and ultimately Omnicom Group Inc. At Rocket, our mission is to Know More – about our clients’ brands, customers and how they consume media.
Rocket is a naturally curious agency and every brief we work on is designed to maximize consumer engagement and as a result, return on investment. Our channel–neutral approach is supported by the way we are structured. Our people work in integrated, cross-disciplinary teams to deliver truly holistic plans. We are proud to work with some of the UK’s most exciting brands including the Co-operative group, Ferrero, Action on Hearing Loss and SEGA. We also work with a number of media owners such as  UKTV and Hearst publications – clients who are well placed to judge agency capabilities.
